name: AuthClient
title: AuthClient
description: An authorization client application or service e.g. an election

fields.name: client_id
fields.title: Client ID
fields.description: The authorization server issues the registered client a client identifier -- a unique string representing the registration information provided by the client.

fields.name: client_secret
fields.title: Client Secret
fields.description: The authorization server issues the registered client a client secret -- a string representing a secret which is going to be used to authorize a registered client.

fields.name: redirect_uri
fields.title: Redirection URI
fields.description: A redirection URI to which the authorization server will send the user-agent back once access is granted (or denied)

fields.name: grant_type
fields.title: Grant Types
fields.description: A grant type is a string representing the grant type issued by the authorization server for this client.
